alert.note: Alert for Pennington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 01 at 3:34PM MDT until July 01 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM MDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL MEADE AND NORTHEASTERN PENNINGTON COUNTIES... At 334 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles northwest of Viewfield, or 23 miles northeast of Rapid City, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Viewfield, Curlew Lake and Elm Springs. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
